name: Into The Pumpkin Patch (frogsdaydream)
description:
A cute short Halloween adventure game!!! Made in a few days for the Spooktober Game Jam!

INCLUDES

  • Very cute cat
  • Lots of pumpkins
  • A talking pumpkin
  • Summoning a demon
  • Spooky friends
  • Skulls

And it's lots of fun and free!!!!

accidentally uploaded this before not in the jam woops
